𒀕 ≈ 𒀔 ≈ 𒀊 ≈ 𒃴 𒀕 ≈ 𒀍 𒀊·𒃲 AB·GAL irigal 𒀕 ≈ 𒀊 gunu 𒀕 < 𒀊 AB abode beith (city) 𒀕 nu₇ <> 𒈾 NA nagar (city)
𒀕 unug <> 𒂗 EN in Proto-Cuneiform 𒀕 iri₁₁ ⇔ Ur 𒌷 (city) URUˢ earth 𒌷𒃲 𒀕 𒀍 earth, land; underworld; grave 𒀕 hiero ≈ Opa : 𒀍 irigal irrigated earth erşetu 𒀕 urugal₂ 𒀍 ≈ 𒌷𒃲 -''- 𒀕 •urn 𓏌

𒀕 nu₇ neo gene creator, begetter 𒀕 ≈ 𒀊 AB:nu₇ bunu₇ #bānû creator, begetter 𒀊 AB-gunu √gene bau

𒋀𒀕𒆠 𒋀𒀊𒆠 𒌶𒆠 Urim Uru أُوْر ʾūr אוּר city of Ur

𒋼𒀕 TEĜ ≈ TE.URNU ≈ TE.urugal₂ 𒋼𒀕 TEĜ₃ תַּכְשִׁיט takhshítʿ jewelry, adornment #šukuttu #unu₂ 𒋼𒀊 unu₆ 𒋼𒀕𒇲 unu₂la₂ unula 𒋼𒀕 TEĜ₃ •ţegk ≈ cheek ≈ #usukku cheek #unu₂ 𒋼𒀕 TEĜ₃ •ţegk ≈ chick girl, young woman #ardatu #unu₂ 𒋼𒀕 TEĜ ≈ Tisch table; the most sacred part of a temple; seat, throne; dwelling, domicile, abode; temple 𒋼𒀕 TEĜ ≈ Tisch banquet; dining hall; food; meal(-time); #mākalû;#mākālu;naptanu;paššūru;mūšabu;usukku;šubtu 𒋼𒀕 TEĜ₃ Dach dwelling

𒀕𒆠 unu.ki iri.ki Ur.ki 𒌷𒀕 or 𒌷𒀔 Uruk (URU.UNUG); Arabic: وركاء or أوروك, Warkāʼ or Auruk; Syriac: ܐܘܿܪܘܿܟ,‘Úrūk; Hebrew: אֶרֶךְ ʼÉreḵ; Ancient Greek: Ὀρχόη, romanized: Orkhóē, Ὀρέχ Orékh, Ὠρύγεια Ōrúgeia

"To Nergal, for the life of Shu-turul king of Akkad, Laba-erishum the palace soothsayer has dedicated this"
